languages.text: "Разве брать то, что никому не принадлежит, воровство? В нашем с тобой деле, шестеренка, прав тот, кто оказался проворнее".
"Is it theft when the goods in question do not belong to anyone? In the tug-of-war between Cold Traders and cogs, possession is nine-tenths of the law."
languages.original_text: "Разве брать то, что никому не принадлежит, воровство? В нашем с тобой деле, шестеренка, прав тот, кто оказался проворнее".

traits.locale_text: "Is it theft when the goods in question do not belong to anyone? In the tug-of-war between Cold Traders and cogs, possession is nine-tenths of the law."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Is it theft when the goods in question do not belong to anyone? In the tug-of-war between Cold Traders and cogs, possession is nine-tenths of the law."

traits.locale_text: "Is it theft when the goods in question do not belong to anyone? In the tug-of-war between Cold Traders and cogs, possession is nine-tenths of the law."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “如果拿走的东西原本就不属于任何人，那怎么能算得上是盗窃呢？在冷市商人和齿轮人之间的拉锯战中，只有一条法律——谁抢到就是谁的。”
languages.original_text: "Is it theft when the goods in question do not belong to anyone? In the tug-of-war between Cold Traders and cogs, possession is nine-tenths of the law."

traits.locale_text: “如果拿走的东西原本就不属于任何人，那怎么能算得上是盗窃呢？在冷市商人和齿轮人之间的拉锯战中，只有一条法律——谁抢到就是谁的。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Est-ce que c'est vraiment un vol quand la marchandise n'appartient à personne ? Dans la lutte qui oppose les marchands de froid aux cogs, neuf lois sur dix parlent de possession. »
languages.original_text: "Is it theft when the goods in question do not belong to anyone? In the tug-of-war between Cold Traders and cogs, possession is nine-tenths of the law."

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce que c'est vraiment un vol quand la marchandise n'appartient à personne ? Dans la lutte qui oppose les marchands de froid aux cogs, neuf lois sur dix parlent de possession. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿Cuenta como hurto si los bienes en cuestión no tienen propietario? En el tira y afloja entre el Comercio Frío y los engranajes, la posesión es la mayor parte de la ley».
languages.original_text: "Is it theft when the goods in question do not belong to anyone? In the tug-of-war between Cold Traders and cogs, possession is nine-tenths of the law."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cuenta como hurto si los bienes en cuestión no tienen propietario? En el tira y afloja entre el Comercio Frío y los engranajes, la posesión es la mayor parte de la ley».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「誰のものかわからない品を盗んでもそうなるのかい？コールド・トレーダーと歯車とで綱引きしたところで、現物を持ってる方が勝つのは目に見えてるよ」
languages.original_text: "Is it theft when the goods in question do not belong to anyone? In the tug-of-war between Cold Traders and cogs, possession is nine-tenths of the law."

traits.locale_text: 「誰のものかわからない品を盗んでもそうなるのかい？コールド・トレーダーと歯車とで綱引きしたところで、現物を持ってる方が勝つのは目に見えてるよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ist es Diebstahl, wenn die fraglichen Gegenstände niemandem gehören? Im Tauziehen zwischen Kalthändlern und Cogs steht das Recht auf der Seite des Besitzenden."
languages.original_text: "Is it theft when the goods in question do not belong to anyone? In the tug-of-war between Cold Traders and cogs, possession is nine-tenths of the law."

traits.locale_text: "Ist es Diebstahl, wenn die fraglichen Gegenstände niemandem gehören? Im Tauziehen zwischen Kalthändlern und Cogs steht das Recht auf der Seite des Besitzenden."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Is it theft when the goods in question do not belong to anyone? In the tug-of-war between Cold Traders and cogs, possession is nine-tenths of the law."

languages.text: "Bahse konu mallar sahipsiz olduğunda da hırsızlık olur mu? Soğuk Tacirler ile teknikçiler arasındaki rekabette kanunun onda dokuzu sahipliktir."
languages.original_text: "Is it theft when the goods in question do not belong to anyone? In the tug-of-war between Cold Traders and cogs, possession is nine-tenths of the law."
